name: oz-chrome-extension
description: Chrome extension that runs Oz-generated per-site customization scripts.

scripts.build:extension: rm -f packages/extension/dist/*.js packages/extension/dist/*.js.map && esbuild packages/extension/src/background.ts packages/extension/src/content.ts packages/extension/src/options.ts packages/extension/src/popup.ts --bundle --format=esm --platform=browser --target=chrome120 --sourcemap --entry-names=[name].bundle --outdir=packages/extension/dist
scripts.build: npm run typecheck && npm run build:extension
